Study to Protect Colporteurs' Income.--Canvassing is an important work, a work equal in importance to the 


                                                      299 

ministry of the Word. Matters must be so arranged that canvassers shall have enough to live on without overdrawing. This door of temptation must be closed and barred. However honest a canvasser may be, circumstances will arise in his work which will be a sore temptation to him. Let the barn be locked before the horse is stolen. This is the best way. . . .
